name: Shade//Shifter
description:
Shade//Shifter is a retro arcade shooter with a dimension-travelling twist!

Battle through the arena

Face a variety of unique and fun enemies as you try to survive your way to the next level

Wield powerful weapons

Swap Dimensions

Use your abilities to travel between worlds, entering a dark and twisted version of the current landscape.  Enemies are different here, and so are you. 

How to Play

Shoot enemies and make your way through the arena! Press the shift key to access your abilities!

*Shade//Shifter is currently in development. Builds currently posted are incomplete, but we're happy to have you play along as we develop!*
